title: The Duties of a secretary
brief_description: Demonstrates the duties of a secretary and shows how they should be carried out to ensure maximum efficiency in the office. Shows correct and incorrect methods of handling a job, the wrong methods being demonstrated in a dream which a young secretary experiences on the eve of beginning a new job.
